accounts.question: How do I open an account?
accounts.answer: You can open an account online in just 5 minutes! Click 'Open Account' on our homepage, provide your basic information, and verify your identity. You'll receive your account details instantly.

accounts.question: What types of accounts do you offer?
accounts.answer: We offer Checking Accounts (for everyday transactions), Savings Accounts (earn interest on your deposits), and Money Market Accounts (higher interest with minimum balance). All accounts come with mobile banking and free debit cards.

accounts.question: What is my account balance?
accounts.answer: I can see you have three accounts with us: Checking Account with $12,543.50, Savings Account with $45,231.80, and a Credit Card with a balance of $2,543.20. Would you like details about any specific account?

loans.question: What loan options are available?
loans.answer: We offer Home Loans (up to $1M, 3.5% APR), Auto Loans (up to $100K, 4.2% APR), Student Loans (up to $200K, 2.9% APR), and Business Loans (up to $5M, 5.5% APR). All loans feature flexible terms and quick approval.

loans.question: How do I apply for a loan?
loans.answer: Visit our Loans page, select your loan type, and click 'Apply Now'. Fill out the online application with your financial information. Most applications are approved within 24 hours!

loans.question: What are the interest rates?
loans.answer: Our current rates are: Home Loans 3.5%, Auto Loans 4.2%, Student Loans 2.9%, and Business Loans 5.5%. Rates may vary based on credit score and loan amount.

cards.question: What credit cards do you offer?
cards.answer: We have three great options: Platinum Rewards Card (3% cash back, $0 annual fee), Gold Travel Card (5x points on travel, $95 annual fee), and Student Cash Card (2% cash back, $0 fees). All include fraud protection!

cards.question: How do I activate my card?
cards.answer: You can activate your card by calling 1-800-SECURE-BANK or through our mobile app. Just go to Cards > Activate New Card and follow the prompts.

cards.question: What rewards do I get?
cards.answer: Rewards vary by card: Platinum offers 3% cash back on all purchases, Gold gives 5x points on travel and dining, and Student Card provides 2% cash back with no fees. Points never expire!

transactions.question: How do I transfer money?
transactions.answer: Log in to your account, go to 'Transfers', select the accounts (from/to), enter the amount, and confirm. Transfers between your accounts are instant. External transfers take 1-3 business days.

transactions.question: What are the transaction fees?
transactions.answer: Internal transfers are always free! External transfers: $0 for standard (1-3 days), $10 for instant. ATM withdrawals at our network are free; out-of-network charges $2.50.

transactions.question: How do I check my transaction history?
transactions.answer: View your transactions in the Accounts page. You'll see all recent activity including deposits, withdrawals, and purchases. You can also download statements for any date range.

security.question: How secure is my account?
security.answer: Your security is our top priority! We use 256-bit encryption, multi-factor authentication, biometric login, and 24/7 fraud monitoring. You're also protected by zero liability coverage.

security.question: What if I lose my card?
security.answer: Immediately call 1-800-SECURE-BANK or use our app to freeze your card. We'll send a replacement within 3-5 business days. You're not liable for unauthorized transactions reported within 60 days.

security.question: How do I reset my password?
security.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page. Enter your email, and we'll send a secure reset link. For additional security, you may need to verify your identity via text or call.

general.question: What are your customer service hours?
general.answer: Our customer service team is available 24/7! Call us at 1-800-SECURE-BANK, use the live chat, or send us a message through the Contact page. We typically respond within 24 hours.

general.question: Do you have a mobile app?
general.answer: Yes! Download the SecureBank app from App Store or Google Play. Features include: mobile check deposit, instant notifications, budgeting tools, and biometric login.

general.question: How do I close my account?
general.answer: We're sorry to see you go! To close an account, please call us at 1-800-SECURE-BANK or visit any branch. Make sure to withdraw or transfer your remaining balance first.
